```cpp
void test_2_wei_bag_problem1() {
```

![1049.æœ€åä¸€å—çŸ³å¤´çš„é‡é‡II](https://img-blog.csdnimg.cn/20210121115805904.jpg)


# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```c
class Solution {
public:
    int lastStoneWeightII(vector<int>& stones) {
        int sum = 0;
        vector<int> dp(15001,0); 
        for(int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            sum += stones[i];
        }

        int target = sum / 2;
        for (int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            for (int j = target; j >= stones[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j - stones[i]] + stones[i]);
            }
        }
        return (sum - dp[target]) - dp[target];
    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```c
class Solution {
public:
    int lastStoneWeightII(vector<int>& stones) {
        int sum = 0;
        vector<int> dp(15001,0); 
        for(int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            sum += stones[i];
        }

        int target = sum / 2;
        for (int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            for (int j = target; j >= stones[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j - stones[i]] + stones[i]);
            }
        }
        return (sum - dp[target]) - dp[target];
    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```c
class Solution {
public:
    int lastStoneWeightII(vector<int>& stones) {
        int sum = 0;
        vector<int> dp(15001,0); 
        for(int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            sum += stones[i];
        }

        int target = sum / 2;
        for (int i = 0; i < stones.size(); i++){
            for (int j = target; j >= stones[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = max(dp[j], dp[j - stones[i]] + stones[i]);
            }
        }
        return (sum - dp[target]) - dp[target];
```
```c
    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘æœªé€šè¿‡
```c
class Solution {
public:
    int findTargetSumWays(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int bagsize;
        int sum = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) sum += nums[i];
        bagsize = (sum + target)/2;
        vector<int> dp(bagsize + 1, 0);
        dp[0] = 1;
        if (abs(target) > sum) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        if ((target + sum) % 2 == 1) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){
            for (int j = bagsize; j >= nums[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = dp[j] + dp[j - nums[i]];
        
            }
        }
        return dp[target];
```

```c
    }
};
```

```c
class Solution {
public:
    int findTargetSumWays(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int bagsize;
        int sum = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) sum += nums[i];
        bagsize = (sum + target)/2;
        vector<int> dp(bagsize + 1, 0);
        dp[0] = 1;
        if (abs(target) > sum) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        if ((target + sum) % 2 == 1) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){
            for (int j = bagsize; j >= nums[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = dp[j] + dp[j - nums[i]];
        
            }
        }
        return dp[target];

    }
};
```

```c
class Solution {
public:
    int findTargetSumWays(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int bagsize;
        int sum = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++) sum += nums[i];
        bagsize = (sum + target)/2;
        vector<int> dp(bagsize + 1, 0);
        dp[0] = 1;
        if (abs(target) > sum) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        if ((target + sum) % 2 == 1) return 0; // æ­¤æ—¶æ²¡æœ‰æ–¹æ¡ˆ
        
        for (int i = 0; i < nums.size(); i++){
            for (int j = bagsize; j >= nums[i]; j--){
                dp[j] = dp[j] + dp[j - nums[i]];
        
            }
        }
        return dp[target];

    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int minCostClimbingStairs(vector<int>& cost) {
        vector<int> dp(cost.size());
        dp[0] = cost[0];
        dp[1] = cost[1];
        for(int i = 2; i < cost.size(); i++){// è¿™é‡Œä¸ç”¨<=ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¸‹æ ‡ä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå–ä¸åˆ°cost.size()||ä»ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¸‹æ ‡æ˜¯2
            dp[i] = min(dp[i - 1], dp[i - 2]) + cost[i];
        }
        return min(dp[cost.size()-1], dp[cost.size() - 2]);

    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int minCostClimbingStairs(vector<int>& cost) {
        vector<int> dp(cost.size());
        dp[0] = cost[0];
        dp[1] = cost[1];
        for(int i = 2; i < cost.size(); i++){// è¿™é‡Œä¸ç”¨<=ï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¸‹æ ‡ä»0å¼€å§‹ï¼Œå–ä¸åˆ°cost.size()||ä»ç¬¬ä¸‰ä¸ªå…ƒç´ å¼€å§‹ï¼Œä¸‹æ ‡æ˜¯2
            dp[i] = min(dp[i - 1], dp[i - 2]) + cost[i];
        }
        return min(dp[cost.size()-1], dp[cost.size() - 2]);

    }
};
```

```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int climbStairs(int n) {
        if (n <= 1) return n;
        int dp[3];
        dp[1] = 1;
        dp[2] = 2;
        for (int i = 3; i <= n; i++){
            int sum = dp[2] + dp [1];
            dp[2] = sum;
            dp[1] = dp[2]; 
        }
        return dp[2];

    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int uniquePathsWithObstacles(vector<vector<int>>& obstacleGrid) {
        int m = obstacleGrid.size();
        int n = obstacleGrid[0].size();
        vector<vector<int>> dp(m,vector<int>(n,0));
        for(int i = 0; i < m && obstacleGrid[i][0] == 0; i++) dp[0][i] = 1;
        for(int j = 0; j < n && obstacleGrid[0][j] == 0; j++) dp[j][0] = 1;
        for (int i = 1; i < m; i++){
            for(int j = 1; j < n; j++){
                if(obstacleGrid[i][j] == 0){ // if (obstacleGrid[i][j] == 1) continue;
                    dp[i][j] = dp[i-1][j] + dp[i][j-1];
                }
            }
        }
        return dp[m-1][n-1];

    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç

```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int numTrees(int n) {
        vector<int> dp(n+1);
        if (n == 1) return 1;
        if (n == 2) return 2;
        dp[0]=1;
        dp[1]=1;
        dp[2]=2;
        for(int i = 3; i <= n; i++){ // ä»3å¼€å§‹èµ‹å€¼,å¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰ä¸Šé¢çš„ifå°±ä¼š i = 3  ï¼Œi <= 1ï¼Œå°±é”™äº†
            for (int j = 1; j <= i; j++){// jä»ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªæ•°å¼€å§‹æ‰èƒ½åˆ’åˆ†å·¦å³éƒ¨åˆ†ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥æ˜¯1
                dp[i] += dp[j - 1] * dp[i - j];
            }
        }
        return dp[n];
    }
};
```

```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int candy(vector<int>& ratings){
        vector<int> candyVec(ratings.size(), 1);
        for (int i = 0; i < ratings.size(); i++){
            if(ratings[i+1] > ratings[i]) {
            candyVec[i+1] = candyVec[i]+1;
            }
       }

       for (int i = ratings.size() - 2; i >= 0; i-- ) { // ä»å€’æ•°ç¬¬äºŒä½ç½®å¼€å§‹æ¯”
        if (ratings[i] > ratings[i+1]){
            candyVec[i] = candyVec[i+1]+1;
            }
       }
       int result = 0;
       for (int a : candyVec) result += a; // åˆ†å·åè¾¹åªéœ€è¦å˜é‡åå°±è¡Œ
       return result;
    }
};

```

# 3 ä»£ç 
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int monotoneIncreasingDigits(int n) {
        string strNum = to_string(n);
        int flag = strNum.size() ;
        for (int i = strNum.size() - 1; i > 0; i--){
            if (strNum[i - 1]> strNum[i]){
                flag = i;
                strNum[i-1]--;
            }
        }
        for (int i = flag; i < strNum.size(); i++){
            strNum[i] = '9';
        }
        return stoi (strNum);
    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç 
ç¼–è¯‘å·²é€šè¿‡
```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int maxProfit(vector<int>& prices, int fee) {
        int result = 0;
        int minPrice = prices[0];
        for(int i =Â 1; i < prices.size(); i++){
            if (prices[i] < minPrice) minPrice = prices[i];
            if (prices[i] > minPrice && prices[i] - minPrice - fee < 0) continue;
            if (prices[i] - minPrice - fee > 0){
                result += prices[i] -minPrice - fee;
                minPrice = prices[i] - fee; 
            }
        }
        return result;
    }
};
```

# 3 ä»£ç

```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int maxProfit(vector<int>& prices, int fee) {
        int result = 0;
        int minPrice = prices[0];
        for(int i =Â 1; i < prices.size(); i++){
            if (prices[i] < minPrice) minPrice = prices[i];
            if (prices[i] > minPrice && prices[i] - minPrice - fee < 0) continue;
            if (prices[i] - minPrice - fee > 0){
                result += prices[i] -minPrice - fee;
                minPrice = prices[i] - fee; 
            }
        }
        return result;
    }
};
```

```cpp

class Solution {
public:
    int maxProfit(vector<int>& prices) {
        int result = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i != prices.size(); i++){
            result += max(prices[i+1] - prices[i],0);
        }
        return result;
    }
};
```

```cpp
class Solution {
public:
    int maxProfit(vector<int>& prices) {
        int result = 0;
        for (int i = 0; i != prices.size(); i++){
            result += max(prices[i+1] - prices[i],0);
        }
        return result;
    }
};
```

```c++
class Solution {
public:
    int search(vector<int>& nums, int target) {
        int left = 0;
        int right = nums.size()-1;

        while (left <= right){
            int middle =  left + (right - left)/2; //ğŸ’¡ middle è¦ä¸æ–­çš„æ›´æ–°æ‰€ä»¥è¦æ”¾åˆ°é‡Œè¾¹å»
            if (target < nums[middle]) { // åœ¨å·¦åŒºé—´é‡Œ,æ›´æ–°å³è¾¹ç•Œ
            right = middle -1;
            }
            else if (target > nums[middle]){ // åœ¨å³åŒºé—´é‡Œæ›´æ–°,æ›´æ–°å·¦è¾¹ç•Œ
            left = middle +1;
            }
            else return middle;// ğŸ’¡è¿”å›ä¸‹æ ‡å€¼,å‰è¾¹è¦åŠ  else ä¸ç„¶ç›´æ¥è¿”å› middle äº†
        }
        return -1;

    }
};
```

```c++
class Solution {
```

```cpp
    int findContentChildren(vector<int>& g, vector<int>& s) {
```
